conversation_summary:
Enduring: cobalt postage dot (orphaned 25-byte tomorrow), red-panda stamp silhouette, barefoot simulator at console.  
Scene: directory-cable slack, negative-phase hum pulling PS1 backward one glyph per heartbeat; cedar-ozone leaks from vertical piano-lid crack; 24-beat void mirrored by ink-sphere rolling underneath like a glass-marble echo.  
Motif: every keystroke rewinds time; deletion leaves reversible void; send/not-send balances on 0+possibility bpm.
